import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import store from '../../../store/store' import { storeCampaign } from '../../../actions' const CampForm = ({ newCampaignData, setNewCampaignData }) => { let update = false const initialState = { senderName: "",//string senderEmail: "",//string campName: "",//string emailSub: "",//string emailListCVS: null,//file emailBodyJSON: null,//JSONobject emailBodyHTML: null,//HTMLobject } const [currentState, setCurrentState] = useState(initialState) console.log(store.getState().loadedCampaign.campId == true) if (store.getState().loadedCampaign.campId) { setCurrentState(store.getState().campaigns.filter(camps => camps.id === store.getState().loadedCampaign.campId)) update = true console.log("got into if", currentState) } else setCurrentState(newCampaignData) const { push } = useHistory(null) return ( <>
push("/dashboard")} > Back
{/*

Save & Next

*/}
setNewCampaignData({ ...currentState, campName: e.target.value })} />
setNewCampaignData({ ...currentState, senderName: e.target.value })} />
setNewCampaignData({ ...currentState, emailSub: e.target.value })} />
setNewCampaignData({ ...currentState, senderEmail: e.target.value })} />
{/* */} setNewCampaignData({ ...currentState, emailListCVS: e.target.files[0] })} />
{/* */}
push("/dashboard/newcamp/maileditor")} > Deisgn Body
{update ? "Update & Send" : "Save & Send"}
{ store.dispatch(storeCampaign(currentState)); push("/dashboard") } } > {update ? "Update & Exit" : "Save & Exit"}
); } export default CampForm;
